description: Returns details for a given workload and deployment pattern, including the available specifications. You can use the ListWorkloads operation to discover the available workload names and the ListWorkloadDeploymentPatterns operation to discover the available deployment pattern names of a given workload.

parameters.name: deploymentPatternName
parameters.description: The name of the deployment pattern.

nested_items.name: workloadDeploymentPattern
nested_items.description: Details about the workload deployment pattern.

nested_items.name: deploymentPatternName
nested_items.description: The name of the deployment pattern.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the deployment pattern.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the deployment pattern.

nested_items.name: specifications
nested_items.description: The settings specified for the deployment. These settings define how to deploy and configure your resources created by the deployment. For more information about the specifications required for creating a deployment for a SAP workload, see SAP deployment specifications. To retrieve the specifications required to create a deployment for other workloads, use the GetWorkloadDeploymentPattern operation.

nested_items.name: allowedValues
nested_items.description: The allowed values of the deployment specification.

nested_items.name: conditionals
nested_items.description: The conditionals used for the deployment specification.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the deployment condition.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the deployment specification.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the deployment specification.

nested_items.name: required
nested_items.description: Indicates if the deployment specification is required.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the deployment pattern.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message of the deployment pattern.

nested_items.name: workloadName
nested_items.description: The workload name of the deployment pattern.

nested_items.name: workloadVersionName
nested_items.description: The workload version name of the deployment pattern.
